mapper.insert: insert into prj_material_buy (pmb_id,apply_department, apply_person, apply_code, apply_prj, task_code, cj_contract_code, cj_contract_name, apply_reason,sum_price) values (#{buy.pmbId},#{buy.applyDepartment}, #{buy.applyPerson}, #{buy.applyCode}, #{buy.applyPrj}, #{buy.taskCode}, #{buy.cjContractCode}, #{buy.cjContractName}, #{buy.applyReason},#{buy.sumPrice})
mapper.update: update prj_material_buy set apply_department=#{buy.applyDepartment}, apply_person=#{buy.applyPerson}, apply_code=#{buy.applyCode}, apply_prj=#{buy.applyPrj}, cj_contract_code=#{buy.cjContractCode}, cj_contract_name=#{buy.cjContractName}, apply_reason=#{buy.applyReason}, sum_price=#{buy.sumPrice} where pmb_id=#{buy.pmbId}
mapper.select: select a.*,c.om_name,d.u_name from prj_material_buy as a left join mode_status as b on a.pmb_id=b.mode_id left join organization_management as c on a.apply_department=c.om_id left join user as d on a.apply_person=d.user_id where b.status=#{status}
select count(pmb_id) from prj_material_buy as a left join mode_status as b on a.pmb_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2
select task_code from prj_material_buy as a left join mode_status as b on a.pmb_id=b.mode_id where b.status=2

select a.*,c.om_name,d.u_name from prj_material_buy as a left join mode_status as b on a.pmb_id=b.mode_id left join organization_management as c on a.apply_department=c.om_id left join user as d on a.apply_person=d.user_id where b.status=2 and a.task_code=#{id}
mapper.update: update prj_material_buy set sum_price=#{sumPrice} where pmb_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select a.*,c.om_name,d.u_name from prj_material_buy as a left join mode_status as b on a.pmb_id=b.mode_id left join organization_management as c on a.apply_department=c.om_id left join user as d on a.apply_person=d.user_id where b.status=2 and a.apply_prj=#{name}

SELECT task_code,apply_department,apply_person,sum_price ,c.om_name,d.u_name from prj_material_buy a left join organization_management as c on a.apply_department=c.om_id left join user as d on a.apply_person=d.user_id group by apply_department

select *,c.om_name,d.u_name from prj_material_buy a left join organization_management as c on a.apply_department=c.om_id left join user as d on a.apply_person=d.user_id where apply_department like #{bumen}
select a.*,c.om_name,d.u_name from prj_material_buy as a left join organization_management as c on a.apply_department=c.om_id left join user as d on a.apply_person=d.user_id where pmb_id=#{id}
